Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +setApiURL:
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Sets the URL of the API

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +activateLogger:
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Activates the Bugfender for a specific app.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +appKey
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Returns the app key.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +maximumLocalStorageSize
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Maximum space availalbe to store local logs. This value is represented in bytes. Default value is 5242880 (1024*1024*5 = 5MB).

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +setMaximumLocalStorageSize:
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Set the maximum space availalbe to store local logs. This value is represented in bytes. There’s a limit of 50 MB.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +deviceIdentifier
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Returns the device identifier used to identify the current device in the Bugfender website.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +sessionIdentifier
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: The session identifier is constant while the application is running.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +setForceEnabled:
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Synchronizes all logs with the server all the time, regardless if this device is enabled or not.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +forceEnabled
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Gets the status of forceEnabled.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +setPrintToConsole:
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Prints messages to console for debugging purposes.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +printToConsole
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Gets the status of printToConsole. printToConsole prints messages to console. By default it is enabled.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +enableUIEventLogging
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Logs all actions performed and screen changes in the application, such as button touches, swipes and gestures.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +enableCrashReporting
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Enable crash reporting tool functionality.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +setDeviceBOOL:forKey:
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Sets a device detail with boolean type.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +setDeviceString:forKey:
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Sets a device detail with string type.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +setDeviceInteger:forKey:
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Sets a device detail with integer type.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +setDeviceDouble:forKey:
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Sets a device detail with double type.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +removeDeviceKey:
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Removes a device detail.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +logWithLineNumber:method:file:level:tag:message:
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Bugfender extended interface for logging, which takes a simple string as log message.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +forceSendOnce
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Synchronizes all logs with the server once, regardless if this device is enabled or not.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +sendIssueWithTitle:text:
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Sends an issue

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +userFeedbackViewControllerWithTitle:hint:subjectPlaceholder:messagePlaceholder:sendButtonTitle:cancelButtonTitle:completion:
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Provides a View Controller to gather the feedback of the users and sent it to Bugfender.

Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.name: +sendUserFeedbackWithSubject:message:
Classes/Bugfender.html#/c:objc(cs)Bugfen.abstract: Allows to create custom UI to gather user feedback and send to Bugfender.
